titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2005
Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow volunteer firefighters a deduction for personal safety clothing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Volunteer Firefighter Tax Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow volunteer firefighters a tax deduction from gross income for personal safety clothing (including helmets and boots) used in performing fire fighting services.
